name: Avantajix
description: Unique Cashback Site in Turkish Language
overview:
Avantajix is the first and only cashback site in Turkey.

Established in 2010 by two veteran numismatists, Tunc Buyurgan and Guclu Kayral; who are not only senior collectors of old money; but also writers of numismatic books and articles, curators of numismatic events, and directors in numismatic associations; Avantajix is only concentrated in “money”.

As its name “avantajix” derives from the word “avantaj” (meaning “advantage” in Turkish) the site gives several online shopping advantages, including cash-back and coupon codes.

  • Cashback: Avantajix take commission from the online retailers and give this commisson in cash (back) to its users; so their online shopping becomes cheaper.

  • Coupon Codes: Avantajix also give coupon codes (discount codes, voucher codes) for an immediate saving while shopping online.

  • Money Saving Tips: As two money experts, Tunc and Guclu give valuable money saving tips to Avantajix users who are the real Turkish “shopping engineers”.
